Type.description: The type of the protocol - StorageAccessProtocol_t

Version.description: The version of the protocol supported

MaxStreams.description: The maximum number of parallel network streams which can be usef for a single transfer

StorageServiceID.description: The ID of the StorageService this protocol is available for

ToComputingServiceID.description: The ID(s) ToComputingService objects that describe connectivity to ComputingServices
